sense.def:
A place
je kakršnakoli točka, stavba, območje, mesto ali dežela.

seg.quote: The cellar was a very dark place.
...photographs of places taken during his travels abroad.
...a meeting place.
We were looking for a good place to camp.

sense.def:
Prostor, kamor nekaj sodi, je
its place
.

seg.quote: She put the book back in its place on the shelf.

sense.def:
Izraz
place
lahko uporabimo za
any
,
no
,
some
ali
every
v pomenu
anywhere
,
nowhere
,
somewhere
ali
everywhere
;

seg.quote: You are not going any place.
He had no place else to go.

sense.def:
One's place
je hiša ali stanovanje, kjer nekdo živi;

seg.quote: What sort of place do they have?

sense.def:
One's place at a table or in a classroom
je sedež, ki je namenjen nekomu ali kjer ta oseba ponavadi sedi.

seg.quote: Mrs Kaul had to leave her place and go to the back of the room.

sense.def:
A place at a table
je tudi del mize, kjer so pripravljeni nož, vilice in druge stvari za eno osebo, tako da tam lahko sede in jé.

seg.quote: Every day 12 places are laid for dinner.

sense.def:
To have a place on a committee
ali
a place at a college
pomeni biti član nekega odbora ali biti sprejet na univerzo kot študent.

seg.quote: I got a place at a teachers' training college.
Harper failed to win a place on the committee.

sense.def:
One's place in a society, system, or situation
je človekov položaj v družbi, sistemu ali okoliščinah ali njegova vloga v odnosu do drugih ljudi.

seg.quote: ...Britain's place in the world.
Frank felt it was not his place to raise any objection.
The demonstration occupies a central place in their political campaign.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
is well placed
, ima veliko prednosti ali sredstev.

seg.quote: As for finance, we're better placed than people think.

sense.def:
One's place in a competition or on a scale
je položaj nekoga ob koncu tekmovanja ali na lestvici.
First place
je zmagovalna uvrstitev ali uvrstitev na vrhu.

seg.quote: The US leapt from sixth place to second.

sense.def:
One's place in a book or speech
je del v knjigi ali govoru, do katerega je nekdo prišel.

seg.quote: He lost his place in his notes.

sense.def:
To place something somewhere
pomeni nekaj premišljeno ali skrbno dati nekam.

seg.quote: She placed the music on the piano and sat down.
Chairs had been placed in rows all down the room.

sense.def:
To place responsibility, pressure, or a restriction on someone
pomeni nekoga obremeniti z odgovornostjo, pritiskom ali omejevanjem.
To place emphasis or blame on something
pomeni nekaj poudariti ali razglasiti kot vzrok za nekaj slabega.

seg.quote: The responsibility placed upon us is too heavy to bear.
Vita is placing most of the blame on her mother.
The New Left placed much emphasis on the role of culture.

sense.def:
To place an order for goods
ali
to place an advert in a newspaper
pomeni naročiti podjetju, naj nam pošlje izbrano blago, ali časopisu, naj objavi naš oglas.

Kadar nekdo
cannot place someone
, se ne more natančno spomniti, kdo je nekdo oziroma ali ga je že kdaj srečal.

cit.quote: vedeti, kdo nekdo je; ‘kam nekoga dati’

seg.quote: She was looking at me as if she could not quite place me.

sense.def:
Ko povemo, koliko
decimal places
je v nekem številu, povemo, koliko številk je desno od decimalne vejice.

Kadar je nekaj
in place
, je tam, kjer mora biti ali kjer je ponavadi. Kadar je nekaj
out of place
, ni tam, kjer mora biti ali kjer je ponavadi.

cit.quote: na svojem mestu; ne na svojem mestu

seg.quote: He held the handle in place while the glue set.
She was slightly out of breath but not one hair was out of place.

sense.def:
Izraz
in the first place
uporabimo, ko govorimo o začetku nekega dogajanja.

seg.quote: Nobody can remember what was agreed in the first place.

sense.def:
Z izrazoma
in the first place
in
in the second place
uvajamo prvo in drugo med več točkami, ki jih navajamo.

seg.quote: ...information that, in the first place, would have been very difficult for me to obtain and, in the second place, would have been useless anyhow.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
takes place
, se zgodi.

seg.quote: The next attack took place four hours later.
The talks will take place in Vienna.

sense.def:
Kadar eno stvar uporabimo
in place of another
ali kadar ena stvar
takes the place of another
, zamenja drugo.

seg.quote: This task is carried out by robots in place of human workers.

sense.def:
To put someone in their place
pomeni nekomu pokazati, da ni tako pomemben ali pameten, kot misli;
